sect1.title: Deploying &dataproc;
sect1.para: &dataproc; provides users with simple means to provision data processing frameworks (such as Hadoop, Spark, and Storm) on OpenStack. This is accomplished by specifying configuration parameters such as the framework version, cluster topology, node hardware details, etc.

listitem.para: Set to true to increase the amount of information written to the log files.

sect2.title: &haSetup; for &dataproc;
sect2.para: Making &dataproc; highly available requires no special configuration. It is sufficient to deploy it on a cluster.
